originalText.text: Best dental experience! Dr. Pham and his team are all so friendly and pays attention to all my needs! I am not easily impressed especially at the dentist! And the office itself is so clean and esthetically pleasing. Definitely recommending all my friends and family here!

text.text: Best dental experience! Dr. Pham and his team are all so friendly and pays attention to all my needs! I am not easily impressed especially at the dentist! And the office itself is so clean and esthetically pleasing. Definitely recommending all my friends and family here!

originalText.text:
I have always dreaded dental appointments and would go out of my way to avoid them, but Dr. Hannah has completely changed my perspective. I was so impressed with his skills and expertise that I traveled in from out of state to visit him at Oral, and it was absolutely worth it.

Dr. Hannah has a calm and friendly demeanor that instantly puts you at ease. For the first time, I didn't feel anxious during my dental appointment. His professionalism and genuine care for his patients are truly remarkable.

The space itself is beautifully designed, with a chic and modern atmosphere. It serves as a refreshing departure from the typical clinical and dated dental offices. As someone with an aversion to tacky decor, I genuinely appreciated the meticulous attention to detail in crafting a welcoming and calming environment.

I highly recommend Dr. Hannah to anyone who, like me, has had negative experiences with dental appointments in the past. He is a fantastic dentist who goes above and beyond to ensure his patients' comfort and satisfaction.

Thank you, Dr. Hannah, and the team at Oral for providing such an exceptional dental experience!

text.text:

originalText.text: The best dental experience I’ve ever had. Wonderful team—everyone was friendly & efficient. No wait at all. Top of the line technology, and a very clean, beautiful office. They took an impressive 3D scan of my teeth within minutes and offered a completely pain free, relaxing dental cleaning. Will definitely be going here regularly.

text.text: The best dental experience I’ve ever had. Wonderful team—everyone was friendly & efficient. No wait at all. Top of the line technology, and a very clean, beautiful office. They took an impressive 3D scan of my teeth within minutes and offered a completely pain free, relaxing dental cleaning. Will definitely be going here regularly.

originalText.text: An absolutely gorgeous dental office with very highly trained staff! It felt like a curated experience with a thorough teeth clean. I have found my neighborhood dentist!

text.text: An absolutely gorgeous dental office with very highly trained staff! It felt like a curated experience with a thorough teeth clean. I have found my neighborhood dentist!

originalText.text:
Finally, a pleasant NYC dental experience! My first time to this office after finding them on Google and was very pleased. It's been difficult to find a dentist near the LES where I felt satisfied with the service and an office that isn't grungy. The office has a beautiful aesthetic and was nice and clean.

Dr. Pham and Nora were so kind and communicative from booking until I left. They were transparent about pricing which I loved and there were no sales pitches like other offices I've visited which I appreciated too.

I'll be returning and definitely recommend them if you are looking for a dentist in lower Manhattan.
